title: @zk0x
body:
I get it. SMILLLEEEEEEE

but hear me out... what if...

frown.

while smiling uses 13 different facial muscles, frowning uses 33. If you were to frown more, you may be able to strengthen your facial muscles even further. By only smiling you are denying the under-used muscles in your face and not fully utilizing your faces potential emotions.

I believe in facial muscle equality. Don't discriminate against the frowning muscles.
